education: Tutored by the Caretakers; extensively self-taught
firstappearance: (Mad Merlin) Journey into Mystery #96 (1963), (Warlock) X-Men #30 (1967), (Maha Yogi) X-Men #47 (1968), (Merlin Demonspawn) Captain Marvel #20, (2001)
groupaffiliation: Former leader of an armored mercenary band
identity: True nature (and multiple identity usage) unknown to the general inhabitants of Earth.
occupation: former owner of Comic Book Castle
powers: Great psychic powers, including the ability to cast illusions, control other's minds, project psionic force bolts, create force fields, telekinesis, and teleportation. While his powers have a limited range, they are potent enough so as to be easily confused for magic. More recently, he has undertaken true magic, utilizing certain intricate spells, enabling him to physically transform others, project magical blasts, etc.
